contentList.content: Prepare to make a volley of thorns the next time you hit a creature with a ranged weapon attack, dealing [1] to it and creatures within [2] of them.
Hail of Thorns
Next ranged weapon attack deals [1] to target and creatures within [2] of them.
Increase seven creatures' <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].
Increase eight creatures' <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].
Increase nine creatures' <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].
Spiritual Weapon
Daylight
Healing Spirit
Food and Water
This weapon is made of shadows, solidifed and given shape through the power of the Weave.
Shadow Blade
Dust Devil
Eat this berry to regain 1 Hit Points. Plump and juicy, this berry exudes a soothing, sweet smell.
Gust of Wind
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> when using this Spell on creatures wearing metal armour. This spell deals [1] at 5th level, [2] at 11th level and [3] at 17th level.
Make up to [1] allied creatures immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> and gain [1] each turn.

Bolster 2 allies with valour and health.

They become Immune to being Frightened and gain Temporary Hit Points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier each turn.
On a successful save, the target still takes half damage. This attack deals an additional [1] for each slot level used above 3rd on the Flaming Sphere.
Plant Growth
Extra difficult terrain - spend 4x <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> when moving.
Black Tentacles

Difficult terrain - <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is halved and creatures may take 3d6 Bludgeoning damage each turn and be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag>.
Hunger of Hadar
Conjure ten magical berries for yourself or a companion. Creatures who eat a berry regain [1].
Bestial Spirit of Air
Bestial Spirit of Land
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].

Hurl a sphere of energy.

It deals 3d8 Thunder damage, or 2d8 Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or poison damage.
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].
Hurl a sphere of energy that deals [1].
Create a cloud of dense fog to Heavily Obscure and Blind creatures within.
Cloudkill
Wall of Stone
Guardian of Faith
Fire Elemental
Earth Elemental
Air Elemental
Water Elemental
Grasping Vine
Maddening Darkness
This bow shoots forth a bolt of lightning.
Lightning Arrow
Shadowspawn
Draconic Spirit
Aether Storm
Conjure an additional familiar per level.
Summon gains [1] to AC, [2] and deal an additional [1] damage on attacks per level.
Spell range increases by [1] per level.
Target deals an additional 1d6 damage of the chosen damage type per level.
Deals an additional 1d6 damage of a random type per level.
Target repeats saving throw each time it takes damage.
Shard still explodes.
Arrow still explodes.
Creates two more meteors per level.
Summon gains [1] to AC, [2] and deal an additional [1] damage on attacks per level and can make a number of attacks equal to half spell's level.
Call Lightning
Deals an additional [1] every two levels.
Create a cloud of magical darkness or infuse an item with magical darkness that Heavily Obscures and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinds</LSTag> creatures within.
Snare Trap
Nathair's Mischief
Create Bonfire
Deals an additional [1] and increases distance pulled or pushed by [2] per level.
Targets still take half damage and aren't pulled or pushed.
Targets still take half damage and aren't slowed.
Gravity Sinkhole
Targets still take half damage and aren't pulled.
Dawn
Not a Dunamancy Wizard
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Must be a Dunamancy Wizard to use this cantrip.
Imbue a creature's weapon with holy power, turning it into a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HOLY_WEAPON">Holy Weapon</LSTag>.

Emit a burst of radiance from your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HOLY_WEAPON">Holy Weapon</LSTag>, causing hostile creatures to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag> and ending the spell.
Targets still take half damage and aren't <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
Absorb Elements
Capture incoming energy, lessening its effect on you and storing it for your next melee attack.
Before being hit, you gain resistance to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder damage. The first melee attack made next turn also deals 1d6 of the triggering damage type.
Prepared to absorb incoming energy of acid, cold, fire, lightning or thunder damage.
Beast Bond

Establish a telepathic link with a friendly beast or one charmed by you. The beast gains <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of you.

Telepathically linked to spellcaster and has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of them. Creature and the spellcaster have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> that would include one another.
Catapult
Surround an object not being worn or carried and weighing [1] lbs or less with force, preparing it to be launched at a creature.
Catapult: Launch
Launch a previously chosen object at a creature.
Prepared to be catapulted at a creature.
Cause Fear
Awaken the sense of mortality in a creature, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightening</LSTag> it.
Creature repeats the <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> at the end of its turns.
Ceremony
Perform one of several religious ceremonies: Bless Water, Coming of Age or Dedication.
Ceremony: Bless Water
Touch a container of water, transforming it to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS_WATER">Holy Water</LSTag>.
Ceremony: Coming of Age
Touch a creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Creatures can only benefit from this rite once.
Ceremony: Coming of Age
Touch a creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Ceremony: Dedication
Touch a creature, granting it a -[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Blessed Water
Received holy water.
Coming of Age
[1] added to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Dedication
[1] added to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Earth Tremor
Cause a tremor in the ground becomes difficult terrain and affects nearby creatures, possibly knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Chaos Bolt
Hurl a mass of chaotic energy that deals a random type of damage between acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, poison, psychic and thunder.
Roll a d8 after casting this spell and gain the ability to it on an additional target within [1] of the initial target on a roll of 1.
Chaos Bolt: Additional
Targeted by Chaos Bolt and cannot be targeted by it again.
Detect Magic
Sense the presence of magic in the area.
Detect a creature that bears magic
Detected Magic
Creature bears magic.
Frost Fingers
Freezing cold blasts from your fingertips and freezes liquids in the area.
Gift of Alacrity
Touch an allied creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to its Initiative <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
[1] added to Initiative <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.

Can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>. Receives <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to spellcaster's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag> per turn.
Magnify Gravity
Gravity in a [1] sphere centered on a chosen point increases momentarily, potentially halving the <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> of creatures in the area.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> halved.
Wrathful Smite: Dispel
Steel your resolve against the Wrathful Smite effect.
Snare

Create a [1] magical trap on the ground. It is triggered when a Small or larger creature moves near it, causing them to possibly fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> and become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag>.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> creatures make Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> at the end of their turns, ending the effect on a success. Another creature can use its action to end the effect as well.
Caustic Brew
A stream of acid emanates from you in the line, possibly covering creatures in the area in acid.
Creatures covered in acid take [1] at the start of their turns.
Acid Removal
Remove acid that covers the target.
Deals [1] per turn.
Unseen Servant
Create an invisible, mindless, shapeless, medium force that performs simple tasks at your command.
Zephyr Strike
Move like the wind, allowing you to avoid provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.

Until the spell ends, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on the next weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> which deals an additional [1]. Hit or miss, you gain an additional [2] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> until the end of your turn.
Cannot provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Gained [1] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>.
Booming Blade
Strike a target with a melee weapon, surrounding them in a booming energy that deals [1] if it willingly moves.
Takes [1] if moving willingly.
Control Flames
Choose a fire surface and expand or extinguish its flames.
Control Flames: Expand
Expand the flames of a fire surface by [1].
Control Flames: Extinguish
Extinguish the flames of a fire surface.
Create Bonfire
Create a bonfire that burns creatures in the bonfireâ€™s space when casting this spell or when the creature starts or ends its turn there.
Bonfire
Deal [1] per turn.
Druidcraft

Create harmless sensory effects that grants you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> or instantly snuff out or light a source of fire on an object.
Create harmless sensory effects that grants you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Instantly snuff out or light a source of fire on an object.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Frostbite
Cause a numbing frost to form on a creature, possibly imposing <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Green-Flame Blade
Strike a target with a melee weapon, causing fire to leap from your target to strike a second nearby foe within [1] of them.
Can shoot fire towards a nearby creature.
Can be targeted by Green-Flame Blade's leaping fire.
Green-Flame
Green-flame leaps from your weapon to strike a nearby foe.
Gust
Seize the air and compel it to possibly push a creature up to [1] away from you or an object weighing no more than 5 pounds [2] away from you.
Lightning Lure
Create a lash of lightning energy that strikes at a creature and possibly pulls them [1] towards you.
Magic Stone
Touch three pebbles and imbue them with magic, allowing you or an ally to make a ranged spell attack with them by throwing the pebbles.
Magic Stone: Hurl
Throw one of the magic imbued pebbles.
Possess [1] magic-imbued stone(s).
Mind Sliver
Drive a disorienting spike of psychic energy into the mind of a creature, possibly imposing a -[1] penalty to its next Saving Throw.
Next <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> reduced by [1].
Mold Earth: Mud
Manipulate a portion of dirt or stone and turn it into mud, becoming difficult terrain.
Mold Earth: Destroy
Manipulate a portion of mud or rock spikes and turn it into dirt or stone.
Mold Earth
Manipulate a portion of dirt, stone, mud or rock spikes to your whims.
Prestidigitation
Perform minor magical tricks that light or snuff out torches and clean environment terrains or creatures.
Cleaned of blood, dirt and sweat.
Primal Savagery
Channel primal magic to cause your teeth or fingernails to sharpen, ready to deliver a corrosive attack.
Sapping Sting
Sap the vitality of a creature, possibly causing it to fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Shape Water
Manipulate water upon the ground and freeze it to become a patch of ice.
Sword Burst
Create a momentary circle of spectral blades that sweep around you to strike nearby creatures.
Thunderclap
Create a burst of thunderous sound that affects nearby creatures.
Toll the Dead
Cause the sound of a dolorous bell to fill the air around a creature, dealing [1] or [2] if it is injured.
Word of Radiance
Utter a divine word that causes burning radiance to erupt from you to all nearby enemies.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> A creature can't be pushed if it is greater than medium in size.
Absorb Elements
When you get hit with Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder damage, you can use your reaction to gain resistance to the triggering damage type.
Aganazzar's Scorcher
Roaring flame emanates from you in a line.
Borrowed Knowledge
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become Proficient in one skill you lack proficiency in.
This spell ends if you cast it again.
Borrowed Knowledge: Acrobatics
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Acrobatics">Acrobatics</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Animal Handling
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="AnimalHandling">Animal Handling</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Athletics
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Arcana
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Arcana">Arcana</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Deception
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Deception">Deception</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: History
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="History">History</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Insight
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Insight">Insight</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Intimidation
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Intimidation">Intimidation</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Investigation
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Investigation">Investigation</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Medicine
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Nature
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Nature">Nature</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Perception
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Performance
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Performance">Performance</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Persuasion
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Persuasion">Persuasion</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Religion
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Religion">Religion</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Sleight of Hand
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="SleightOfHand">Sleight of Hand</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Stealth
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth</LSTag> if you're not already.
Borrowed Knowledge: Survival
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become proficient in <LSTag Tooltip="Survival">Survival</LSTag> if you're not already.
Has proficiency in Acrobatics <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Animal Handling <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Athletics <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Arcana <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Deception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in History <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Insight <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Investigation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Medicine <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Nature <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Performance <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Persuasion <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Religion <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Sleight of Hand <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Stealth <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has proficiency in Survival <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Continual Flame
A flame that cannot be smothered or quenched springs forth from an object that you touch.
Darkness: Cloud
Create a cloud of magical darkness that Heavily Obscures and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDNESS">Blinds</LSTag> creatures within.
Darkness: Item
Infuse an item with magical darkness that Heavily Obscures and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDNESS">Blinds</LSTag> creatures within [1] of it.
Dragon's Breath
Imbue an ally with the power to spew magical energy from their mouth.
Dragon's Breath: Fire
Imbue an ally with the power to spew fire from their mouth.
Dragon's Breath: Cold
Imbue an ally with the power to spew cold from their mouth.
Dragon's Breath: Lightning
Imbue an ally with the power to spew lightning from their mouth.
Dragon's Breath: Poison
Imbue an ally with the power to spew poison from their mouth.
Dragon's Breath: Acid
Imbue an ally with the power to spew acid from their mouth.
Exhale fire in a cone.
Exhale acid in a cone.
Exhale cold in a cone.
Exhale lightning in a cone.
Exhale poison in a cone.
Gained ability to exhale fire in a cone.
Gained ability to exhale acid in a cone.
Gained ability to exhale cold in a cone.
Gained ability to exhale lightning in a cone.
Gained ability to exhale poison in a cone.
Dust Devil
Summon an elemental force that resembles a dust devil.
Creatures that end their turn within [1] of the dust devil take [2] and are pushed back [3].
Possibly deal [1] and push creature back [2] or deal half damage and no push back on a successful save.
Flock of Familiars
Gain the service of [1] familiars, each a fey spirit that takes an animal form you choose.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Already summoned familiars disappear when using this spell.
Flock of Familiars: Cat
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a cat that can distract your enemies.
Flock of Familiars: Crab
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a crab. Their sharp pincers can slow enemies.
Flock of Familiars: Frog
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a frog. Their skin is covered with dizzying toxins.
Flock of Familiars: Rat
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a rat. Their infectious bite can spread disease.
Flock of Familiars: Raven
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a raven. They can <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDNESS">Blind</LSTag> enemies.
Flock of Familiars: Spider
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a spider. Their deadly bite can poison enemies.
Fortune's Favor

Impart latent luck to yourself or an ally. When the chosen creature makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>, or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, it can choose to gain a +[1] bonus to the roll. Alternatively, when an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> is made against the chosen creature, it can choose to impose a -[1] penalty to the roll.
When a chosen creature applies the bonus or penalty, the spell on that creature ends.

Creature can grant a bonus +[1] to an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag> of theirs or grant a -[1] penalty against an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against them.
Activate to grant yourself a +[1] bonus to your next <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>.
Healing Spirit
Call forth a nature spirit to soothe the wounded. While a creature is within [1] of the spirit, you can heal it for [2].
Healing Spirit: Movement
Allow the healing spirit to move up to [1].
Healing Spirit: Heal
Heal a creature for [1] through your Healing Spirit.
Creatures within [1] may regain [2].
Kinetic Jaunt

Magically empower your movement, giving yourself an additional [1] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> and the ability to avoid <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Gained additional [1] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> and don't provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Maximilian's Earthen Grasp
Create a hand composed of soil reach for and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrain</LSTag> a creature.

An affected creature may use an action to free themselves by making a Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">check</LSTag> against your spell save DC, escaping and no longer being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> on a success.
Crush a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> target or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrain</LSTag> a different creature.
Maximillian's Earthen Grasp: Crush
Crush a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> target.
Maximillian's Earthen Grasp: Change
Reach for a different creature with the earthen hand, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restraining</LSTag> it and freeing the previous target.
Break Free
Attempt to free yourself.
Mind Spike
Breach a creature's mind, possibly preventing it from hiding and granting it no benefit from being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
Nathair's Mischief
Fill a [1] cube with fey and draconic magic, producing random, magical effects when the spell is cast and at the start of your turns.

The magical effects produced in the cube can cause creatures to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> by you, to be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>, to become Incapacitated and unable to move or can turn the area into Difficult Terrain.
Nathair's Mischief: Move
Move the cube of fey and draconic magic up to [1].
Rime's Binding Ice
A burst of cold energy emanates from you, hindering creatures with ice formations that reduces their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> to [1].
Break the ice hindering a creature.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> reduced to [1]. Can break ice with <LSTag Tooltip="Action">action</LSTag>.
Shadow Blade
Create a sword of solidified shadow in your hand which deals [1]. When attacking a target that is in dim light or darkness, the attack is made with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Deals [1] and grants <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against creatures within dim light or darkness.
Snowball Storm
A flurry of magic snowballs erupts from an area.
Suggestion
Suggest a course of activity and magically influence a creature to become an ally.
Temporary ally of the spellcaster.
Summon Beast
Call forth an allied bestial spirit from an environment of Air or Land.
Summon Beast: Air
Call forth an allied bestial spirit from the environment of Air.
Summon Beast: Land
Call forth an allied bestial spirit from the environment of Land.
Mind Whip
Psychically lash out at [1] creature(s), possibly preventing them from taking Reactions and limiting it using movement, an Action or a Bonus Action.
Cannot take Actions or Bonus Actions.
Cannot take Bonus Actions or Reactions.
Cannot move or take Reactions.
Vortex Warp
Magically twist space around another creature, possibly preparing them to be teleported.
Teleport a creature you've magically twisted the space around to an unoccupied space.
Warding Wind

Strong wind blows around and moves with you in a [1] radius. Other creature within the wind are in difficult terrain. Creatures also have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on ranged attacks passing through the wind.
Ranged weapon attacks have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> going in and out of the area.
Treated as being in difficult terrain and ranged weapon attacks have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> going in and out of the area.
Wither and Bloom
Invoke both death and life in an area, causing hostile creatures to wither.
An ally can expend an unspent Hit Dice to recover <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
Wither and Bloom: Regain HP
Spend a Hit Dice to regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
Spend [1] Hit Dice to regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
Can expend unspent hit die to regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
Ashardalon's Stride

Billowing dragon flames blast from your feet, granting explosive speed that increases your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> increases by [1] and prevents provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
When moving within [1] of a creature or an object, it takes [2] per turn.
